lyrics:
Itâ€™s Gonna Be Me Lyrics[Intro]
(It's gonna be me)
Ooh, yeah

[Verse 1]
You might've been hurt, babe (Babe)
That ain't no lie
You've seen them all come and go, oh
I remember you told me
That it made you believe in no man, no cry
Maybe that's why

[Chorus]
Every little thing I do
Never seems enough for you
You don't wanna lose it again
But I'm not like them
Baby, when you finally
Get to love somebody
Guess what
It's gonna be me (Me, me, me)
[Verse 2]
You've got no choice, babe (Babe)
But to move on, you know
There ain't no time to waste
'Cause you're just too blind (Too blind) to see
But in the end, you know it's gonna be me
You can't deny
So just tell me why

[Chorus]
Every little thing I do
Never seems enough for you
You don't wanna lose it again
But I'm not like them
Baby, when you finally
Get to love somebody (Somebody)
Guess what (Guess what)
It's gonna be me

[Post-Chorus]
(It's gonna be me) Ayy, ayy, ayy
Ooh, yeah, yeah

[Bridge]
There comes a day
When I'll be the one
You'll see
It's gonna (Gonna, gonna, gonna, gonna)
It's gonna be me
[Chorus]
All that I do
Is not enough for you
Don't wanna lose it
But I'm not like that
When finally (Finally)
You get to love (Oh)
Guess what (Guess what)
(It's gonna be me)

[Chorus]
Every little thing I do
Never seems enough for you (For you, babe)
You don't wanna lose it again (Don't wanna lose it)
But I'm not like them
Baby, when you finally
Get to love somebody (Love)
Guess what (Guess what)
It's gonna be me

[Chorus]
Every little thing I do (Oh)
Never seems enough for you
You don't wanna lose it again (Don't wanna lose it)
But I'm not like them
Baby, when you finally
Get to love somebody (Love somebody)
Guess what (Guess what)
It's gonna be me14Embed
